name: Spike Jump (HER6TYF8F8)
description:
Starting the game

Press 2nd  and then 0 on your calculator.

You should be taken to the the catalog.

press 8 and scroll down with the down key until you find prgm.

select prgm

press 2nd and then press alpha.

See those green letters above the keys?

press the keys with those green letters above them to spell BANANAJU.

press enter.

Now you're in the game

How to play

The first thing you'll see is a menu.

If you haven't played the game before then press 2.

If you want to continue then press 1,

You'll see a spike moving from right to left.

Jump over the spike when it gets close to you.

The spike will keep getting faster as you play the game for longer.

If you touch the spike then you die.

Control

Jump  --- Up arrow key
